findings.title: Deployer can block user
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to block users.

findings.title: Deployer cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The deployer loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Deployer cannot burn
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the capability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Deployer cannot pause contract
findings.description: The deployer does not have the ability to pause the contract.

findings.title: Unencrypted Private Data On-Chain
findings.description: Access to Critical Private Variable via Public Method

findings.title: Message call with hardcoded gas amount
findings.description: Improper initialization of gas amount in message calls can lead to unexpected behavior and potential security risks.

findings.title: Hash Collisions with Multiple Variable Length Arguments
findings.description: This vulnerability allows an attacker to bypass authentication by capturing and replaying a hash collision, potentially leading to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Presence of unused variables
findings.description: Unused variables are present in the code, which can lead to irrelevant code and potential security risks.

findings.title: Right-To Left Override control character (U+202E)
findings.description: The Right-To-Left Override control character (U+202E) is used to override the Unicode bidirectional algorithm for a sequence of characters. This can lead to phishing attacks or other security issues.

findings.title: Arbitrary Jump with Function Type Variable
findings.description: The finding indicates a potential vulnerability where an arbitrary jump can occur due to the use of function type variables.

findings.title: Incorrect Inheritance Order
findings.description: The contract has an incorrect inheritance order which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Requirement Violation
findings.description: Improper Following of Specification by Caller

findings.title: Lack of Proper Signature Verification
findings.description: Improper verification of cryptographic signature, allowing potential signature replay attacks.
